title: Cost Management Strategies for Online Learning Programs for Medical Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Conducting project-based assessments in offline classroom settings utilizing digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can classify and explain three or more cost components by e-learning development phase.
Learners can allocate budgets to virtual projects by applying budget estimation models for medical field e-learning production.
Learners can comparatively analyze the impact of diverse instructional methods (video, simulation, quizzes) on total development costs.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
